replies.bodyText: Not exactly, it was always possibly flaky :) It means we wait up to 5 seconds for a broker to be detected as dead, but if you have a 1s probe interval, 2 required suspect probes, and a 2s probe timeout, it can take up to 5s to detect, so it was always going to be risky. I imagine if we looked around we'd find some flaky builds for this one
